amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment SA 1242 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary disciple with respect to amendment SA 1242 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 77.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 313(b)(1)(D) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1242.
Amendment SA 1242 proposed by Senator Collins to Amendment SA 891. (consideration: CR S1233; text: CR S1347-1354) In the nature of a substitute.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary disciple with respect to amendment SA 1242 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 77.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1242 proposed by Senator Collins to Amendment SA 891.
